translation.en: Let me see your other hand.
If I move this hand, I'm afraid my stomach will fall out.
translation.ja: 動かせば 内臓が飛び出す

translation.en: I need to see your other hand.
I miss the Cassie I was.
A totally normal high school girl.
translation.ja: “ごく普通の高校生 キャシー”

translation.en: I wonder what that Cassie would think of me now.
translation.ja: 人を殺す 今の自分を⸺

translation.en: You know, he was supposed to be here.
Why are the hot ones always so unreliable?
translation.ja: 人気者は気まぐれだから

translation.en: What would I even say to him?
I don't know him, and he doesn't even know me.
You're a girl. He's a boy.
What? You have something against pink?
translation.ja: 何だよ　ピンクは嫌いか？

translation.en: No, no. I totally like it.
This is actually my sister's phone.
I dropped her off at a sleepover, and she took mine by mistake.
translation.ja: 友達の家に送った時取り違えた

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, I have it. No, I haven't looked at your text messages.
translation.ja: ああ　持ってる中は見てないって
僕らが守ろうとした物も

translation.en: but that was the last normal day of my life. All of us are done for
translation.ja: あの日が最後の“日常”なんて

translation.en: When you're in high school, just about everything feels like the end of the world.
translation.ja: 高校では全てが“世界の終わり”に感じる

translation.en: An early curfew, a final exam...
Sullivan. What are we doing out here? Why not just tell her where you're gonna kick it?
translation.ja: サリヴァン正面に蹴ってどうする？

translation.en: Hey, check it out. Look at this. It's so freaky.
translation.ja: ねえ 見てなんか不気味だよ

translation.en: That's it. You're done. Off the field.
No. But, look, it's really weird.
Turns out, what we thought was the end of the world wasn't.
translation.ja: 正真正銘の“世界の終わり”が 始まった

translation.en: What, did someone famous die or something?
It appears to be metallic and of a considerable size.
translation.ja: この巨大な物体の話題で⸺

translation.en: Across the world, social media has been awash with panic and speculation
translation.ja: 世界中の人々が大騒ぎしています

translation.en: as these images spread like wildfire.
The president has authorized NASA to attempt communication with the object
translation.ja: 地球を周回している物体に対し

translation.en: BREAKING NEWS MESSAGE FROM THE WHITE HOUSE that is now circling our planet
and is currently over the United States, moving west over Ohio.
translation.ja: 物体は現在オハイオ上空を飛行中で…

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's right over us.
There were no messages from our galactic party crashers during the first ten days.
translation.ja: 招かれざる客は最初の10日間 沈黙していた

translation.en: But pretty soon, they had a name.
translation.ja: じきに 呼び名ができた

translation.en: They say they don't feel safe so close to the city.
Lizbeth: Guess who's sitting right behind me...
Everybody look at the equation on the board.
will tell him yr avail for end-of-world sex Who can give me the derivative of X?
I'm sure this is just a power outage.
The Others hit us with an electromagnetic pulse that killed all the power on the planet.
translation.ja: “アザーズ”は 電磁パルスで電子機器を破壊した

translation.en: No more engines. No more electricity. No more running water.
translation.ja: あらゆるエンジンが止まり電気も水道も使えない

translation.en: No more everything we took for granted.
translation.ja: 当たり前の日常が消えた

translation.en: That was the last time I saw Ben Parish.
I guess he's dead now. Like everyone else in that room.
translation.ja: 大勢と同じようにすでに死んだだろう

translation.en: Here, Sam. Grab me another, okay? Thank you.
translation.ja: サム　次のボトルを

translation.en: At the time, we thought that was it.
translation.ja: 攻撃は終わったと思ったが⸺

translation.en: Come on, Sam. It's an earthquake!
Just keep your head down, okay?
Come here. Hold on to me.
In Ohio, we only had the lake to worry about.
translation.ja: オハイオには湖しかなかったが

translation.en: But by the ocean, I can only imagine.
translation.ja: 海辺ではさらに大変だったはず

translation.en: Every coastal city, every island, gone.
translation.ja: あらゆる沿岸都市やあらゆる島が 消えた

translation.en: There are over 300 billion birds in the world.
translation.ja: 世界に 鳥は3000億羽以上生息している
人間１人に対し 75羽の計算だ

translation.en: Mom said the avian flu was already one of the world's deadliest viruses.
translation.ja: 鳥インフルエンザは毒性が強い

translation.en: In the 3rd Wave, the Others modified it. Made it unstoppable.
translation.ja: 第３波で“アザーズ”はウイルスの致死性を高め⸺

translation.en: And the birds spread it across the planet.
translation.ja: 鳥が地球中に拡散させた

translation.en: Line A. Line A is for those who have already been assessed.
translation.ja: すでに診断を受けた人はＡ列に並んでください

translation.en: If you're waiting to be assessed, then proceed to Line B.
translation.ja: これから診断を受ける人はＢ列に進んでください

translation.en: I ain't happy over here. I feel fine!
translation.ja: 出してくれ俺は病気じゃない

translation.en: I should be on the area that isn't quarantined!
-It's okay. I didn't even touch her. -It is not okay. You can't be here.
translation.ja: 触ってない 危険なの

translation.en: Sweetheart, I need you to go home and look after Sammy, okay?
translation.ja: キャシー帰ってサムの世話をして

translation.en: But, Mom, I wanna help you here.
-I know. Can you get her out of here now? -I wanna help.
translation.ja: ここで手伝いたい 娘を連れ出して

translation.en: Miss, you gotta leave. Let's go.
Some people were immune to the virus.
And a few people got sick and somehow recovered.
translation.ja: 中には 感染しても治った人もいた

translation.en: Why don't they just get it over with?
I think a better question is, "What do they need?"
They've been very careful so far not to damage it any more than absolutely necessary.
translation.ja: 連中は 注意深く攻撃しできるだけ温存してる

translation.en: I think that's why they're here, Cassie.
Ready to walk for a while, Sammy?
Dad, how far is it to the refugee camp?
Just a few miles. We should be there by nightfall.
translation.ja: そうでもない 夜までには着く

translation.en: -Dad, look. Is this it? -Yeah, buddy. I think so.
translation.ja: パパ　あれかな？ そうだ

translation.en: Latrines are off to the left.
How many people are there here?
I don't know how many we got now.
translation.ja: 今は どうだったか…

translation.en: Dining hall over here. When's the last time you had a hot meal?
translation.ja: 食堂は そっちだ温かい食事を出す

translation.en: This button changes out the clip.
You're gonna carry this with you at all times,
you're not gonna tell anybody you have it, and you're only gonna use it if it's life or death. You got it?
translation.ja: 誰にも言うな命が危ない時だけ使うんだ

translation.en: I thought we were safe here.

translation.ja: もう安全な場所はない
分からない　行こう

translation.en: -What's going on? -All right, just take it easy.
I thought the cars didn't work.
Ladies and gentlemen, I am Colonel Vosch of the United States Army.
translation.ja: 陸軍大佐のヴォーシュだ

translation.en: My men and I are from the Wright-Patterson Air Force Base.
translation.ja: ライト･パターソン基地から来た

translation.en: Let's get you people out of here.
We should be ready to go at a moment's notice, all right?
translation.ja: 荷物を キャシーと行け

translation.en: -Come on. -You can go right on the bus.
Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.ja: 大人は説明会のため 食堂へ

translation.en: Children, please move to the buses for transport.
translation.ja: 子供はバスに乗ってください

translation.en: Adults, please move to the mess hall for a briefing.
translation.ja: 大人は説明会のため 食堂へ

translation.en: Do you think they have electricity if the trucks are working?
I don't know. Why, you still have a phone?

translation.ja: 充電器も？ もちろんよ

translation.en: My orders are to get just the kids onto the bus.
Well, those might be your orders, but they're my kids.
-We'll wait for another bus. -It's okay, Private.
translation.ja: 次のバスでも… 私が

translation.en: Look, you're welcome to keep 'em here with you if you want, but if they were my kids, I'd get 'em on that bus.
translation.ja: 次を待つのは自由だが私なら子供を行かせる

translation.en: We have reason to believe there's an imminent threat to this location.
translation.ja: ここは敵に狙われてる

translation.en: We're trying to get everyone to safety as quickly as we can, and this is the only working transport we've got, so we're taking shifts based on need.
translation.ja: 安全な基地に移送するがバスの数に限りがある

translation.en: Kids first, then we come back for the rest of ya.
translation.ja: だから まず子供を

translation.en: Well, how safe is it at Wright-Patterson?
Safest place there is right now.
And the buses will just come right back?
Like I said, it's your call.
Just 'cause some man in uniform tries to tell us what to do doesn't mean we actually have to follow his orders.
translation.ja: 軍人の指示でも従う必要ないわ

translation.en: Okay, I want you on this one, all right? -I'll be right behind you. -We can't split up. And we're gonna have dinner tonight. We're going to the same place.
translation.ja: パパは 次のバスで行く夕食は一緒に食べられる

translation.en: It's the Army, okay? This is our Army. It's fine. It's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　米軍が守ってくれる

translation.en: -Don't leave me alone. -All right. Come here.

translation.ja: 愛してるよ　弟を頼む

translation.en: Take care of your brother. All right? Come here.
translation.ja: 愛してるよ　弟を頼む さあ サム

translation.en: I want you to listen to your sister, all right? -Okay. -She's in charge. -Okay? -Dad.
translation.ja: 姉さんの言うことをちゃんと聞くんだぞ

translation.en: I'll be there before you know it.
Here, head to the back, Sam.

translation.ja: リュックを ベアを忘れてた

translation.en: -I forgot Bear! I need to go get him! -Sam, stop. Sit down.
translation.ja: 置いてきちゃった 何なの？

translation.en: -It's okay. What's up? -I can't. I can't go without him.
All right, all right, all right. I'll go get him, okay?
translation.ja: いいわ　取ってくる
ここにいて　すぐ戻るから
ここにいて　すぐ戻るから 本当？

translation.en: Yeah, I'll be right back. I promise.
translation.ja: 必ず戻るわ　約束する

translation.en: This way. Down to the mess hall. In the mess hall now, please.
translation.ja: 大人は食堂に集まってくれ

translation.en: Bear, Bear, Bear. Bear, Bear, Bear, Bear.
translation.ja: ベア　ベア　ベア…

translation.en: Can I have your attention, please?
If you'll all just quiet down.
We believe the 4th Wave has begun.
The Others have come down off their ship.
Apparently, they have the ability to inhabit human hosts and control their actions.
translation.ja: 人間に寄生し言動を操る力があるようだ

translation.en: What we do know is they have snipers in these woods, and they are targeting survivors.
translation.ja: 森に潜み 狙撃の機会を狙っている者もいる

translation.en: We've got intel that would suggest some of them could be right here in this very camp.
translation.ja: このキャンプにも紛れ込んでるらしい

translation.en: So, what... Are you saying that some of us are Others?
translation.ja: この中にアザーズがいるってことか？

translation.en: Please. There's a lot we still don't know.
We can detect them in children. Unfortunately, the screening procedure for adults is a bit more complicated.
translation.ja: 子供は基地で検査できるが大人の検査は複雑だ

translation.en: I know. I know you all wanna get back to your families.
translation.ja: 子供に会いたいのは分かるが⸺

translation.en: Unfortunately, we're gonna have to move you all to a secure holding facility
translation.ja: まず全員 別の施設へ移送する

translation.en: so they can run some screening protocols. Folks, please!
translation.ja: そこで検査を行う　いいな

translation.en: You need to understand, there is no way to differentiate us from the Others
translation.ja: アザーズと人間の区別には⸺ 徹底的な検査が必要なのだ
徹底的な検査が必要なのだ

translation.en: The sooner we get you screened, the sooner we can get you back to your families. This is bullshit!
translation.ja: 検査が終われば 子供に会える

translation.en: I am not an Other, okay? I'm not going anywhere.
translation.ja: 俺はアザーズじゃない

translation.en: Sir, no one's saying that you are.
This is the reality of our situation.
Now, if you'd just calm down.
translation.ja: 皆さん　落ち着いて

translation.en: Let me out of here. Get out of my way. Watch out.
-I wanna see my kids! -Put it down!
translation.ja: 子供に会う 下ろせ

translation.en: Support team members, meet arrivals on the tarmac.
translation.ja: 支援部隊　到着者に備えよ

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.ja: 赤い印で待て　番号を呼ぶ
赤い印で待て　番号を呼ぶ

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.ja: 赤い印で待て　番号を呼ぶ

translation.en: Stand in the red circle. Wait for your number to be called.
translation.ja: 赤い印で待て　番号を呼ぶ

translation.en: Ben Parish. They called me "Zombie" in quarantine.
translation.ja: ベン･パリッシュ隔離所では“ゾンビ”と

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
Mom and Dad killed by the virus.
translation.ja: 両親はウイルスでやられた

translation.en: But it didn't kill you, did it?
That where the nickname came from?
You get to help avenge her death.
translation.ja: 妹の仇(かたき)を討てる

translation.en: This puts out a signal that we can track.
translation.ja: 居場所を追跡する探知器よ

translation.en: You kids are the most important thing right now.
translation.ja: あなたたち若者は貴重な戦力になる

translation.en: We need every one of you to help us fight the Others.
translation.ja: 全員でアザーズと戦うの

translation.en: So we don't wanna lose you. Stand up.
How are we supposed to fight the Others if we don't even know what they are?
translation.ja: 敵の姿も分からず戦えと？

translation.en: Don't worry. He won't be able to see us.
translation.ja: 平気よ向こうからは見えない

translation.en: I know. It's impossible to tell.
translation.ja: 分かるわ　人間みたいでしょ

translation.en: The Others infest real humans like some sort of parasite.
translation.ja: 寄生虫みたいに人間の中に入り込み⸺

translation.en: Take over their minds, their bodies.

translation.ja: 薬や放射線は効かず手術してもムダ

translation.en: The only way to kill 'em is to kill the host.
translation.ja: “宿主(ホスト)”を殺すしかない

translation.en: You just need to destroy the thing inside him.
translation.ja: 寄生してる敵を殺すの
連中は 妹さんを殺した

translation.en: If you're gonna be on my squad, I need to know that you will do whatever it takes to...
translation.ja: 軍の一員となるならどんなことでもする覚悟を…

translation.en: Here's how you kill off a species.
translation.ja: 種(しゅ)を淘汰するなら⸺

translation.en: First, you take out the easy ones, the weak, the exposed.
translation.ja: まず 弱くて無防備な個体を殺す

translation.en: Kill them as efficiently as possible.
translation.ja: できるだけ効率的にだ

translation.en: That was the first three Waves.
But even if you bug bomb a house, there's always a few cockroaches left.
translation.ja: でも しぶといゴキブリもいる

translation.en: Now, we are like those cockroaches.
And the Others are picking us off. One by one.
translation.ja: 連中は１人ずつ狙い退治し始めた

translation.en: And because the Others look like us,
translation.ja: 連中も 見かけは人間だ
誰も信じてはいけない
サム　必ず迎えに行くわ

translation.en: How do you rid the world of humans?
First, you rid the humans of their humanity.
translation.ja: まず 人間らしさを奪うこと
“ライト･パターソン基地まで74キロ”

translation.en: "When I was a child, I spoke as a child.
translation.ja: “子供の頃は 言葉遣いも⸺”

translation.en: I thought and I reasoned as a child.
translation.ja: “考え方も判断力も子供だった”

translation.en: But when I became a man,
Those words never meant more to me than they do right now,
translation.ja: この聖句を君たちに贈る
我々の希望であり未来だ

translation.en: The best and brightest vision of who we are and what we're fighting for.
translation.ja: 君たちこそが我々が戦う理由だ

translation.en: Our intelligence tells us the Others are readying themselves for a final attack.
translation.ja: アザーズは 最後の攻撃の準備をしているらしい
第５波(フィフス･ウェイブ)だ

translation.en: What form it will take, we do not know.
translation.ja: どんな攻撃になるかは不明だ

translation.en: there will be no more Waves.
No more conflicts. Humanity as we know it will be wiped from the face of the Earth.
translation.ja: 勝負がつき地上から人類が消えるからだ

translation.en: Now. I'm gonna tell you some things I know.
translation.ja: いいか　私は信じている

translation.en: They will not overrun it. They will not possess it.
translation.ja: 勝手に荒らされ居座られてたまるか

translation.en: So with whatever time we have left,
you will learn to think, speak, move and fight like the soldiers you are.
translation.ja: 兵士の考え方や話し方 戦い方を学べ

translation.en: Let the weight of our loss fuel you.
Let the weight of our dead embolden you.
Let the weight of our hope drive you to victory.
translation.ja: 希望の力で 勝利へ突き進め
兵士よ　できるのか？

translation.en: Where's my gun? Where's my gun? Where is it?
translation.ja: 銃はどこ？どうしてないの？

translation.en: How the hell do you know my name?

translation.ja: 僕はエヴァン･ウォーカー

translation.en: You were bleeding on the highway. I brought you back here, to my house.
translation.ja: 僕の家だ君は高速道路で倒れてた

translation.en: All right, when you found me on the highway, I had my gun. Where is it?
What did you do? Your leg, Cassie.
translation.ja: 何をした？脚の傷は大丈夫か？

translation.en: -Don't touch me! Don't touch me! Don't... -Your leg.
-This is gonna hurt. -All right. Just do it. Just do it.
How long have I been here?
How far is Wright-Patterson from here?

translation.ja: 100キロほど先だ なぜ聞く？
大丈夫だ　ここは安全だよ
大丈夫だ　ここは安全だよ いいえもう安全な場所なんてない

translation.en: All right, we're not safe anywhere anymore.
translation.ja: いいえもう安全な場所なんてない

translation.en: Why did you wanna know how close Wright-Patterson was?
translation.ja: 基地までの距離をなぜ聞いた？

translation.en: It's my brother. The Army took him there, so I...
translation.ja: 弟が連れていかれたから

translation.en: I need to get him back.
You gotta get your strength back.
The way everything's happened, I guess it just makes me feel more...
translation.ja: 人を助ければ自分も人間だと⸺

translation.en: And you need help with that?
Don't you tell him my card.
By the way, I heard the new guy coming in got kicked out of their last squad.
translation.ja: 問題児が班に来るって
問題児？ 反抗的らしい
男じゃなくて 女だけど

translation.en: I was the leader of my last squad.
So the guy I replace went Section 8. Why?
translation.ja: メンバーが１人イカれたんだって？

translation.en: I heard it's 'cause this squad's so bad he was afraid you'd get him killed when the 5th Wave hits.
translation.ja: この班じゃ死ぬと思ったんだろ
君は その班に来た

translation.en: Keep staring at my ass and I'll rip your throats out.
translation.ja: 今度 私の尻を見たらノドを引き裂く

translation.en: Let's be clear. I'm not taking orders from you. I'm not gonna die with you geniuses.
translation.ja: 命令は受けないよクズと心中する気はない

translation.en: If anyone in this barrack touches me, I'll kill them.
translation.ja: 私に触ったら 殺すからね

translation.en: I like to play chess. Do you play?
translation.ja: チェスをしたい　できる？

translation.en: But if you wanna play some strip poker later--
translation.ja: ストリップ･ポーカーなら…
セクハラ発言も許さない

translation.en: You had my gun the whole time! Why'd you lie?
I was afraid you'd shoot me.
For all I knew, you were an Other.
translation.ja: アザーズかもしれない
さっきの男は アザーズ？

translation.en: They're using those drones to hunt down survivors.
translation.ja: ドローンで生存者を捜してる
サムを助けなきゃ キャシー
基地のように人が集まる場所は⸺

translation.en: You think that Sammy's already dead?
You're wrong, Evan. All right? He's alive.
translation.ja: ありえない　サムは生きてる

translation.en: He's alive, and I'm gonna go get him.
You're not gonna make it very far on your own.
You know what? Screw you, Evan. -I don't need you. I don't need anyone. -Cassie, come on.
translation.ja: やめてあなたの力は必要ない

translation.en: -If you go, I'll just follow you. -Actually, no. If I need someone to carve a cane for me...
You can't stop me. How are you gonna stop me?
I don't know. Maybe I'll shoot you!
What, like you shot that guy with the crucifix?
translation.ja: コンビニの男みたいに？

translation.en: -I didn't think you were gonna live. -Don't touch me!
I can't promise what you'll find, but I will get you there.
translation.ja: 君の望む結末は約束できないが

translation.en: This is a waste of time.
Those kids are gonna be dead before their boots hit the ground.
Especially with you as squad leader.
translation.ja: あんたがリーダーだし

translation.en: You don't know anything about me.
You did good in school, had a bunch of friends. You probably played football.
translation.ja: 成績優秀　人気者でアメフト部に所属

translation.en: You might have even been team captain.
And then, all of a sudden, it wasn't.
No more games to win. No one to get weak-kneed at that pretty smile.
translation.ja: もう試合に勝つことも女に囲まれることもない

translation.en: You weren't ready for the end of the world.
And I was doing fine out there on my own. Till they forced me onto their stupid school bus.
translation.ja: １人で生きられるのにバスに乗せられた

translation.en: We didn't get rescued, dumbass. We got drafted.
translation.ja: 救助じゃない　徴兵だ

translation.en: you teach us how to shoot.

translation.ja: 恋人のネックレス？　姉妹？

translation.en: Can you teach me that thing where you took the gun out of my hand?
translation.ja: 私の手から銃を奪った技を教えて

translation.en: Let's just leave any potential disarming to me,
translation.ja: 僕から銃を奪いたいってことか？

translation.en: -all right? -No. No, I need to be ready.
translation.ja: まさか　戦いの準備よ

translation.en: Cassie, it's okay. You don't have to be tough all the time.
translation.ja: キャシー　いつも強い君でいる必要はない

translation.en: I promised Sam that I would be there for him, no matter what.
translation.ja: サムの所に戻ると約束したの

translation.en: I made that promise to him.
Okay. Grab the barrel of the gun with your left,
and with your right, snap my hand away.
translation.ja: 右手で 相手の手を押す

translation.en: Hey, you're not gonna hurt me. All right. Like that, but stronger.
translation.ja: 手順はいいだが思い切りやれ

translation.en: Now at the end, you'll grab my wrist and pull it toward you.
translation.ja: 最後に手首をつかみ引き寄せる
こう？ ああ　上出来だ

translation.en: Okay. Don't be so scared of your weapon.
translation.ja: いいか　銃を恐れるな

translation.en: You gotta think that the gun is a part of you.
Not the gun firing, you firing.
Zombie, the Colonel wants to see you, now.
translation.ja: ゾンビ　大佐が呼んでる

translation.en: Could be. Seems like a good target.
Simultaneous attacks on the last of our metropolitan areas.
translation.ja: 複数の都市が 同時に襲われた

translation.en: A full-on invasion. This is it.
translation.ja: 敵の総攻撃だ これは⸺

translation.en: Here, I want to show you something.
These employ the same technology as the detector viewer from medical.
translation.ja: 医務室のスコープの技術を⸺

translation.en: We've improved it. Made it mobile.
The idea is to allow our soldiers in the field to instantly differentiate between friend and foe.
translation.ja: 戦場で 敵と味方を見分けるためにな

translation.en: You look at the enemy through this and it lights 'em up green.
translation.ja: レンズを通すと 敵は緑に光る

translation.en: We can see them before they know they've been seen. We take back the advantage.
translation.ja: 敵を先に探知できれば 有利だ

translation.en: The only thing left to do now is test the optics in live conditions.
translation.ja: 実戦で レンズを試したい

translation.en: Which is why tomorrow at 2100, I'm sending four squads into battle equipped with these helmets.
translation.ja: そこで明日21時４つの班を出動させる

translation.en: Your squad will be among those four.
Bring that squad back in one piece.

translation.ja: おはよう おはよう

translation.en: Yeah. Actually, you know, she was... She was really funny.
translation.ja: ええ　そうなのいつも笑わせてくれた

translation.en: -And this guy. -He's nobody. This must be Ben Parish.
translation.ja: こっちの彼はベン･パリッシュだね？

translation.en: I really wish you hadn't read my journal.
translation.ja: 日記を読まないでほしかった

translation.en: I can't wait to meet him.
How do you know without a compass?
You know, I can make one out of a pin and a glass of water.
translation.ja: ピンとコップ１杯の水で作れる

translation.en: Didn't peg you for a Girl Scout.
What'd you peg me as? A cheerleader?
translation.ja: チアリーダーには見えないでしょ？

translation.en: I've never been a huge fan of the outdoors. Too many bugs.
translation.ja: 僕はアウトドアが苦手だ虫が嫌いでさ

translation.en: I had a scholarship to Kent State. Mechanical engineering.
translation.ja: 奨学金で大学へ行った専攻は機械工学だ

translation.en: Zombie, are they really sending us to fight?
translation.ja: ゾンビ　本当に戦いに行くの？

translation.en: Just go to sleep, all right?
But my sister called me Sams.

translation.ja: 僕らが守ろうとした物も

translation.en: Homes, places we've grown All of us are done for
translation.ja: いずれ 家もふるさとも　　　　　 みんなも消える

translation.en: Could you guys please shut up?
We live in a beautiful world
translation.ja: でも僕らは美しい世界に　　　　　　　　生きている

translation.en: Yeah, we do Yeah, we do
translation.ja: そうさ　そのとおり

translation.en: Infiltrate enemy hornet's nest, verify enemy and terminate.
translation.ja: 敵の巣を攻撃し打撃を与えること

translation.en: Remember, the Others light up green in your visors.
translation.ja: 忘れるなアザーズは緑に光る

translation.en: At mission complete, signal for extraction.
translation.ja: 任務完了後 合図を

translation.en: Holy shit, it's working. You guys, I got two of 'em straight ahead.
translation.ja: 前方に緑の光が２つ見える

translation.en: TARGET DETECTED And I heard it. I was right there.
I peed. I definitely just peed.
-They're over here, too! -Run for the alley!

translation.ja: ティーカップは？置き去りに？
ティーカップは？置き去りに？ ここよ

translation.en: Don't do that! Don't scare me like that!
translation.ja: 何だ　心配させるな

translation.en: Down, down! Now, now! Down, down, down! Oompa's been shot!
Don't be dead. Come on, man. Don't be dead! Please don't be dead!
translation.ja: 死ぬな 死ぬんじゃない

translation.en: We can't stay here. They'll be back.
translation.ja: 敵は また来るはず

translation.en: That alleyway. We'll have cover there.
No, it's too far. If we're out in the open that long they'll pick us off one by one.
translation.ja: 遠すぎだ走っても狙い撃ちされる

translation.en: I'll distract them. When I tell you to run, run as fast as you can.
translation.ja: 敵の気を引くから合図で走って

translation.en: Listen up! On my go, haul ass to the alleyway.
translation.ja: 合図したら 全速力で路地へ

translation.en: Back out there? Are you crazy?
translation.ja: また外へ？　ありえない

translation.en: Listen, Teacup, you just gotta trust me, okay? You're gonna run and don't look back.
translation.ja: ティーカップ振り返らずに走るんだ

translation.en: -What about Oompa? -He's dead, man. We gotta leave him.
translation.ja: ウンパは？ もう死んだ
ゾンビ！ よし 走れ
よし 走れ 行け
撃つな　リンガーだ

translation.en: I'd hug you if I didn't think you'd punch me in the nuts for it.
translation.ja: ハグしたいが 殴るだろ？

translation.en: Okay, so what do we do now?
They knock planes out of the sky and cause earthquakes, but they're afraid of an army of children?
translation.ja: 電磁パルスを使う敵がガキに負ける？

translation.en: There's something Vosch isn't telling us.
Okay, I'm not risking my life for this.
translation.ja: 軍に命を懸けたくない

translation.en: I'm unenlisting. I'm better out there on my own.
translation.ja: １人のほうが安全だ除隊する

translation.en: If you know what's best for you, you'll do the same.
-Holy shit! What the hell is this? -Zombie, you see this?
-She's green! -What the hell, you guys? Put your guns down.
translation.ja: 何のマネ？　銃を下げろ

translation.en: You're one of them! You're an alien!
What are you talking about? I just saved your asses!
If she's one of them, we have to take her out now.
Poundcake, just calm down, all right?
-We have to. -I can see it! I can see it inside of her!
translation.ja: 見える　彼女の中が見える

translation.en: -Zombie, what do we do? Do we shoot her? -It's your call, Zombie.
translation.ja: 撃つか？ 命令を　ゾンビ

translation.en: -Oh, my God! What's going on, man? -Come on, man.
Hey. Put your guns down. Put your guns down.
Don't shoot. Calm down. She's not an Other. Neither am I.
-I'm glowing green, right? -Yeah. Yeah. Yeah, listen.
translation.ja: 緑に見えるんだろ？だが聞いてくれ

translation.en: You know me. Come on, Dumbo. You know who I am. Put the guns down.
translation.ja: 俺を知ってるだろダンボ 銃を置いてくれ

translation.en: Just put 'em down! I'm not an Other.
translation.ja: 置け！ 外の人々も敵じゃなかったはず

translation.en: I don't even think any of those people out there shooting at us are Others.
translation.ja: 外の人々も敵じゃなかったはず

translation.en: Reznik, Vosch... They lied to us.
translation.ja: 全てヴォーシュたちのウソだ

translation.en: Green doesn't mean alien. Green means human. Just, without one of these.
translation.ja: 緑の光は人間だ探知器ナシのな

translation.en: Those lenses, these trackers, it's all fake, man.
translation.ja: 探知器を入れてない人間が 緑に光って見えるんだ

translation.en: It's an illusion. It's a trick.
translation.ja: 緑に光って見えるんだ

translation.en: They weren't testing these. They were testing us. They were seeing how we would do, how we would hold up under pressure.
translation.ja: 連中は俺たちを試そうとしたんだ

translation.en: All right? If we would do what we were trained to do.
-To kill Others! -No, to kill the survivors, man!
translation.ja: 敵を？ 違う　人間をだ

translation.en: Well, what about the guys outside, the ones that were shooting at us?
Why would the Army want us to kill other humans?

translation.ja: ヴォーシュや 軍の連中が⸺

translation.en: And because we're kids, they thought they could manipulate us into doing their dirty work.
translation.ja: 子供を操り汚れ仕事をさせてる
それじゃ どうするの？

translation.en: We go AWOL. This means we can't go back. You know that, right?
translation.ja: 二度と基地に戻らない覚悟で？

translation.en: Nugget. I left him back at the base.
translation.ja: ナゲットを基地に置いてきた
守りたくて 大変だ

translation.en: -No, man. I gotta go back. -You can't just wander back in there.
I'll put the tracker back in. They'll pick me up. You guys go ahead. I will meet up with you later.
translation.ja: 基地から救出し 後で合流する

translation.en: Dumbo, where can I take a bullet in the torso and not die?
translation.ja: ダンボ撃ってもいい部位は？
何だって？ 腹でも撃たれてないと疑われる

translation.en: Where can I take a bullet in the torso? I gotta make it look real.
translation.ja: 腹でも撃たれてないと疑われる

translation.en: It's the only way I'm getting back in alive.
It's impossible, man. There's too many organs.
There's gotta be somewhere, man. Ringer, she can make the shot, all right? I know she can.
translation.ja: どこかあるだろリンガーが撃つから

translation.en: You want me to shoot you?
Don't pretend like you haven't thought about it.
Where do you want me to shoot him?

translation.ja: そんな…　どうしよう

translation.en: You're out of your drone sector.
Hey. Put the gun down. Stay away.
translation.ja: 銃を置け　こっちに来るな

translation.en: If I was gonna kill you, Cassie, I would've done it a long time ago.
translation.ja: 殺す気なら すでに殺してる

translation.en: You're one of them. You're a fucking Other.
This isn't the first time the Others have been here.
They came before and created sleeper agents, like me.
translation.ja: そして一部の人間の意識に細工した

translation.en: Growing up, there was this voice in my head. It was quiet, but it was there.
translation.ja: “頭の中で声が聞こえる”と思いながら育った

translation.en: it was like a switch was flipped inside me,
translation.ja: スイッチが切り替わった

translation.en: How many people have you killed?
The disease that the Others created. The disease that you created.
translation.ja: ウイルスを作ったのはあなたたちよ

translation.en: Our kind believe that love is just a trick.
translation.ja: 僕たちの種は 愛を信じない

translation.en: An instinct. A way to protect your genetic future.
translation.ja: 愛は 種の生存本能が見せる幻だ

translation.en: I don't know how. I don't understand it, but...
translation.ja: 何が起きたか自分でも分からないが⸺

translation.en: It was like you flipped the switch back.
You made me wanna be human again.
Love's not a trick. It's real.
I know now because of you.
translation.ja: 君のおかげで分かった

translation.en: I don't wanna hear any more.
Cassie, please, just let me help you.
translation.ja: キャシー　力になりたい

translation.en: All I wanna do is help you find Sam.
All right. Get on your knees, Evan.
All right. Come on, just get on your knees.
The Army is controlled by the Others.
translation.ja: 軍はアザーズに支配され⸺

translation.en: They'll search you. You can't be armed.
translation.ja: 荷物検査をされる銃は持っていくな

translation.en: 2-9-5 on deck! The rest of the squad are reported KIA.
translation.ja: 295番は救出残りは戦闘中に死亡

translation.en: Ma'am, it's all right. It's all right. We've got you.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　一緒に行こう

translation.en: Any family not known to be dead?
You know why you're here, Cassie?
I know. It's impossible to tell.
translation.ja: 分かるわ　人間みたいでしょ

translation.en: We tried to move to cover, but as soon as we did...
translation.ja: 建物に向かって走った時

translation.en: -I took a bullet, sir. -But you survived.
translation.ja: 俺も腹を だが生きてる

translation.en: the way that bullet went right through you and managed to... miss everything important.
translation.ja: 弾が貫通しているのに大事な臓器は無傷とは

translation.en: You drop your lie, and I'll drop mine.
translation.ja: 互いにウソはやめよう

translation.en: You're gonna kill me, aren't you?
What's the point of any of this?
translation.ja: 人間が あんたらに何をした？
人間が あんたらに何をした？ 何も

translation.en: Other than occupy a space we need.
We're not that different, Ben. Your kind would do exactly the same thing.
translation.ja: 人間と同じことをしてるだけだ

translation.en: Our kind wouldn't have wiped out an entire species.
translation.ja: 人間は⸺ 他の種を絶滅させない

translation.en: You've been doing it for centuries.
Sir, Sergeant Reznik's dead. Security found her body.
translation.ja: 大佐　警備がレズニック軍曹の遺体を⸺

translation.en: There's more. Three guards were killed at the west gate...
translation.ja: 医務室で発見 西ゲートでも…

translation.en: An explosion, sir. It came from inside the base.
-Get rid of him. -Damage to Sector Three!
We need to move all the recruits off-base. Get 'em on planes to Wonderland now.
translation.ja: 新兵を全員次の拠点に輸送しろ

translation.en: Deploy units. Find out who's attacking us.
They're taking out our security cameras.
translation.ja: 監視カメラをやられた

translation.en: Bring the drones home so we can see who's attacking us.
translation.ja: ドローンを基地に戻せ

translation.en: -Don't move! Don't move! -It's okay! Okay, all right!
Cassie? My name's Ben Parish. We used to go to high school together.
translation.ja: キャシー？ ベンだ　同じ高校の…

translation.en: I'm looking for my brother, Sam.

translation.ja: サムってサム･サリヴァンか？

translation.en: -You know my brother? -Yes, we're in the same squad.
translation.ja: 知ってる？ 同じ班だ　俺も捜してた

translation.en: -You know where he is? -I'm trying to get to him.
translation.ja: 同じ班だ　俺も捜してた

translation.en: All recruits report to the transport area.
translation.ja: 新兵　輸送エリアへ

translation.en: They're sending the kids off to war. Vosch. The Army. They're Others.
translation.ja: 軍は若者を利用し 戦わせてる

translation.en: Look, Sam is about to get on one of those planes. If we don't go now, you're not gonna see him again. You understand?
translation.ja: サムが輸送機に乗ったら二度と会えないぞ

translation.en: -Recruits report to the transport area. -All right.
Once the recruits reach Wonderland, get them ready for immediate deployment.
translation.ja: 新兵は すぐ実戦に出す

translation.en: Hey! This is a restricted area.
translation.ja: おい　ここは立ち入り禁止だぞ
待て 膝をつけ　手は頭に！
膝をつけ　手は頭に！

translation.en: No, it's fine. He's one of us. It's okay.
Evan, what are you doing here?
I told you not to follow me.
Well, I decided to ignore you.
In about ten minutes, when the last plane full of kids takes off,
translation.ja: 若者を乗せた輸送機が出たら

translation.en: I'm taking this place down, for good.
I'm sorry I lied to you, Cassie.
translation.ja: ウソをついて ごめん

translation.en: I was wrong when I said I was both one of you and one of them.
translation.ja: それに 人間とアザーズの両方じゃない

translation.en: You can't be both. You have to choose.
translation.ja: どちらかしか選べない

translation.en: I think Evan Walker's about to blow this place up.

translation.ja: リーダーのそばを離れるな

translation.en: Proceed to the transport vehicles in a calm and orderly fashion.
translation.ja: 冷静に 整然と輸送機に乗り込むこと
リーダーのそばを離れるな

translation.en: Once you are on the plane, you will receive further instructions.
translation.ja: 輸送機の中で 次の指示を出す

translation.en: Keep moving. Straight ahead. Stay with your group leader.
translation.ja: 足を止めるな　進め

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
I missed you so much, Sam.
Look what I brought back for you.
I gotta take his tracker out.
All right? It's not gonna hurt, okay?
Good. Power up my bird. Last plane's in the air, evacuate the base.
translation.ja: 私のヘリも準備させろ基地を捨てるぞ

translation.en: Run, run! Go for the truck.
-Quick, Sammy. Get in! -All right, come on! Get in! Get in!
translation.ja: サム 早く乗り込め

translation.en: Make sure you give her the food first.
Let me know if it starts hurting or anything like that.
It's a little early, isn't it?
You were named after a star, right?

translation.ja: “キャシー”って カシオペアよ
そう　星座にちなんでるの

translation.en: I was named after Ben & Jerry's.
Nothing made my dad happier than ice cream.
I'm sure you made him happier.
We have to save those other kids.
How are we gonna do that?
Let's worry about that tomorrow and just go get something to eat.
translation.ja: 明日 考えることにしてとにかく食べよう

translation.en: Hey, Sam. Here, wake up, buddy.
translation.ja: サム　そろそろ起きて

translation.en: Come on, lazy bones. Put your bear down, would you?
translation.ja: ネボスケ君　ベアは置け

translation.en: The Others see our hope as a weakness,
translation.ja: 希望は弱点であり幻想だと⸺

translation.en: It's our hope that lets us survive.
translation.ja: 希望があるから生きていける

translation.en: That lets us bend, but remain unbroken.
-You two knew each other? -Yeah, we went to high school together.
It's our hope that will let us win one day.
translation.ja: 希望があれば いつか勝てる

translation.en: It's our hope that makes us human.
translation.ja: 希望こそが 人間である証しだ
